Articles.Content:
You think that's a swarm? Bah, just wait until you see what I have in store for you lot!

I'm going to be busy for the next hour or so, maybe Spartwo should deploy first.

Daecorp, just throw yourself into this, it's at three, maybe four people right now.

Well Id like to go first so I ll let you pick rules, ships, and place if thats ok

Eve,Zekes has 3 92 ton destroyers and 2 20 ton fighters.You saw my chart,Shadow is well...being shadowy,use 320 tons within reason,I'm setting up last.

wrong tonnage

Well Id like to go first so I ll let you pick rules, ships, and place if thats ok

I'm pretty sure they already picked rules. I just want to know what they are.
No attacking someone whom has been attacked in the previous turn.All else is bog standard.

Eve,Zekes has 3 92 ton destroyers and 2 20 ton fighters.You saw my chart,Shadow is well...being shadowy,use 360 tons within reason,I'm setting up last.

Probably two Iblis-class cruisers and one or two light MARS Units.

I'm pretty sure they already picked rules. I just want to know what they are.

Ok i miss read your first post and thought you were fighting me.

Sure. What are the parameters?

320 tons, total. Turn based attack, no doubleganging on someone.

Location: Eve

Ship allowance: 320 Tons of anything.

Order of deployment: Zekes first, and me last.

Involved companies: ALL OF THEM.

Time of battle: When we're all ready.

Order of battle: Me first, Zekes last.

Location: Eve

Ship allowance: 320 Tons of anything.

Order of deployment: Zekes first, and me last.

Involved companies: ALL OF THEM.

Time of battle: When we're all ready.

Order of battle: Me first, Zekes last.

Me last I'll also be taking the last turn I don't expect to win.

me last i'll also be taking the last turn i don't expect to win.

not with that attitude you wont!!!!

Me last I'll also be taking the last turn I don't expect to win.

neither do i, ill probably back myself into a corner and fend off anyone's attacks.

neither do i, ill probably back myself into a corner and fend off anyone's attacks.

Circles are pointless shapes

Special rules:

No ganging up.
